text: Ezɨ Benhadat ua me amangizɨ, me iza akar igharazim Ahap ganɨga ghaze, “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn uan mɨdorozir gumazir avɨriba inigh izɨtɨ, me nɨn nguibar ekiar kam gasɨghasigham. Me bar bizibagh asɨghasightɨ da pura mɨnezibar mɨn iregham. Kɨ kamaghɨn damighan koghtɨ, nan aseba na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham.”
